data.title: Standing square coat rack Martijn - 175x40x40cm with 24 hooks - Black
data.meta_description: Are you looking for a coat rack for hanging jackets in, for example, a wardrobe, waiting or office space? View now this sturdy
data.text:
At work we work with volume discounts because with more ordering is less transport costs! So honest for you and for us. The discount can be combined and is about the number of products you ordered from us.

How much discount can I get?

Number of products Discount 4 6% 6 8% 8 12% 10 14%

* Can be combined with different products* services and customized options are excluded.

The discount will be automatically calculated at checkout!

Do you wish to order more? Then you can always request a quote.

Free shipping from € 30!

Does work also deliver abroad? Yes. You can also receive our products in Belgium, Germany & France. Without shipping costs from € 30 of course.

Delivered quickly

For some products, "ordered before 12:00, the next day at home". This only applies to the Netherlands. For other countries, the delivery time is 3-5 business days.

Return

Not satisfied with your article? You can return your item up to 14 days after receipt.

With work we care about sustainability. Returning has an impact on the environment, so we apply the following conditions: - Our full range can be returned, we only ask you to pay the shipping costs yourself. Articles from the refurbished, living living and workliving range can be returned for free because they are delivered mounted and must be picked up with collection appointment.

Why do we make a difference in this? Millions of articles are destroyed worldwide because they are returned with poor quality or the item simply cannot be sold again. Sin and harmful to the environment! Our articles from refurbished and our range, on the other hand, are taken back by our us, checked, where necessary refurbished and are offered again as "second chances". As a result, raw materials and therefore articles are not unnecessarily lost.

For quick processing it helps to register your return in advance. Mail the data; Order number, reason for return and any photos of product (in the event of damage) to support@workliving.nl. We help you further.

Sustainable shopping: How you can contribute yourself:

Be well advised when selecting your product. Returning or exchange is always possible, but it is even better to make the right choice in one go. We are happy to help you with advice and tips. We inform you about the delivery day and the time that our driver comes by. Help unnecessary kilometers to reduce by contacting in time if the delivery time does not work out well or if we are allowed to deliver to the neighbors, for example.

Another question? You can always contact our service team, accessible via support@workliving.nl or call +31 (0) 85 00 41 412. In the case of technical defects or defects, contact our service team.
